block.p: The Manufacturers Hanover Trust Company said 10 New York area branches of Goldome would be converted into Manufacturers Hanover branches during the Memorial Day weekend. In announcing that it had completed the purchase of about $1.3 billion in deposits at 13 New York Goldome branches, Manufacturers said the acquisition would increase its retail deposits to about $18.6 billion.
